name: Adventure Map Algonquin P.P.1 Map - North
description: A 1:60,000-scale map made specifically for hiking, canoeing, and other outdoor pursuits. Covers the Highway 60 Corridor of Algonquin Provincial Park, which includes many popular canoe routes and the Western Uplands and Highland trails. Easy-to-read, waterproof, and eliminates declination problems.
